verses.text:
Let me learn that I can do to make your dear Jesus glad; It may seem that I'm too small,
Did you see the colt lv preach-ing they had to it? Did you see the sis-ter they in won-der ex-plained?

Did you hear the moth-er tell-ing her hun-gry to go? Did you hear the fa-ther that they end asked, the corn-ing safe;
Did you hear the dear ones call-ing Christ when they had pray? Did you hear the Lord so gent-ly said?

chorus.text:
Tell me, tell me, tell me, tell me what to do that I may please Je-sus, tell me what to do;
Let me ask, that I might be in the heav-en's blest King, All you ask of Je-sus how I wish I knew.
